name: AstralBirds
description:
Control a flock leader with your mouse, and watch a flock of birds follow you through the challenges presented. Solve the puzzles and complete the levels!

Music credit - Artist name: Shady Dave.

Abstract: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/345838/ ;

Time break no high note: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/277375/ ;

Feelings of twilight loop: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/333811/ ;

Anticipation: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/272361/
